authorAttributions.displayName: Benedict Nwachukwu, MD, MBA: Shoulder, Knee & Hip Specialist
Benedict Nwachukwu, MD, MBA: Shoulder, Knee & Hip Specialist

adrFormatAddress: 610 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Nwachukwu is a superb surgeon. Typical surgeon confidence, but he sits and chats to answer all questions, and answers clearly. Unlike many surgeons, never makes you feel rushed - even in follow up appointments. His staff is the same way. He and his staff are extremely responsive on the portal. Any questions I’ve asked have been answered no later than the next morning. I have had 2 surgeries by him (not his fault I needed the second one, it was a result of a getting hit by a motorcycle) so I have spent more time with him than most. Would come back to him in an instant if I ever needed his expertise again. Best of the best.

originalText.text: Dr Nwachukwu and his team are absolutely wonderful. He as well as his entire team has some of the best bed side manner and are very accommodating as well as quick with finding solutions to injuries. I’ve been having issues with my knee for years and did physical therapy to no avail. After meeting with him once, I was already given a precise diagnosis for what was wrong with my knee and all my options for treatment. The first being a cortisone shot which he did on the day of the first appointment. In the weeks following his office checked on me consistently and during the second a simple AKS surgery was decided on. As a young athlete I was very nervous about surgery but him and his team made me feel SO comfortable the entire time and I felt like I was in good hands throughout the entire process. He fit me into his schedule very quickly with an operation date only a few weeks from the second appointment. The surgery went amazing! And while I’m still on the road to recovery his office and he himself are amazing at working around my schedule as I play ncaa athletics in a different state!

originalText.text: Great experience with Dr. Nwachukwu. I had a labral tear in my hip that had caused me a lot of pain, and he was able to operate and fix the tear. I’m two months post op and already feeling much better! He was very patient and walked me through my X-ray images to explain where the tear was, it was a much better experience than I had with a previous orthopedic surgeon.

originalText.text:
2 weeks post hip surgery with Dr. Nwachuwku & very pleased with the results so far!

From my initial appointment months ago, through surgery, and now recovering post op, his team is incredibly professional, kind, and caring.

Saw a couple other doctors about my hip before and no one made me feel as comfortable and confident in their plan of care as PA Erin P and Dr. Nwachukwu. I’d highly recommend them to anyone with hip pain.

originalText.text: Dr. Nwachukwu and his team is awesome. They listened to my questions as well as answered all to my satisfaction. I exit the visit with great confidence of fully recovering from my surgery . He is kind and have great bedside manners.
